name: Prism (Demo)
description:
Prism by Caity Nitahara and Rachel Pulido

Content Warning: Language, Violence

Prism is one of the world’s most influential companies, but how far have they gone to get that much power? Raven, a college medical student, has been trying to figure out the answer to that. Unfortunately for her, Prism has their ways of keeping people quiet. Violet (you), Prism’s most efficient hitman, silences Raven before she has the chance to reveal the company’s secrets to the world. But, after everything she’s learned about them, Raven won’t let anything stop her from taking down the Prism, not even death. And who better to help her and the person who murdered her. Will Violet choose to help her latest victim destroy Prism, or will they stay loyal to their employer?

Prism is a 2D point and click visual novel where your choices affect the game’s outcome. Play as Violet, completing jobs given to her by Prism. Interact with Raven as she tries to convince you to turn against Prism. Whether you listen to her or ignore her, the choice is yours.
